IT - System Access issue.definition: User cannot access system due to authorization, role, or permission issues
examples: User unable to login to Anaplan
Access denied while opening planning workspace
User does not have access to planning module
User unable to open model due to permission error
User cannot login after password reset
User not able to access version module

IT - Master Data/ mapping issue.definition: System mapping or master data configuration missing or incorrect
examples: Cost center not mapped in planning hierarchy
Mapping not available for new entity
Planning entity not mapped to hierarchy
Mapping issue for new business unit

User - Master data incorporation in syst.definition: User requesting new master data creation or addition
symptoms: new entity needs to be added
examples: New cost center needs to be created
Add new entity to planning model
New profit center needs to be added
Add new region in planning model

IT - System Version issue.definition: Version mismatch or version configuration issue

User - Logic changes during ABP.definition: User requesting change in planning or calculation logic
examples: User requested change in planning logic

User - Logic mistakes in excel vs system.definition: Mismatch between Excel calculations and system calculations
examples: System and Excel showing different values

IT - System linkage issue.definition: Integration or linkage between systems not working
examples: Data not flowing from SAP to Anaplan

User - System Knowledge Gap.definition: User needs help or does not understand system functionality
examples: User does not know how to use planning model

IT - Data entry handholding.definition: User needs IT assistance for data entry
examples: User needs assistance updating planning data
User unable to enter planning values

User - Mapping missing.definition: User did not provide required mapping information

User - Master data delayed input.definition: User delayed providing required master data
examples: User has not provided master data
